en: Looks like we got a rumble!
The heroes defeated the monsters! And all was good.
{shock} Oh no!~The "scary" monsters won! {sad} What will happen now?
The heroes managed to ward off the monsters... {sad} but not without heavy sacrifices.
{surprised} The monster sees two heros up against them and is enraged. {shock} The monster's power has skyrocketed!
{determined} The hero sees two monsters up against them and is filled with courage. {cheer} The hero's power has skyrocketed!
Half of an HP bar has been pulled! All characters have 50% more HP!
An MP bar has been pulled! All magic attacks have been powered up!
A Flee button has been pulled! All characters have increased evasion!
An Attack button has been pulled! All regular attacks have been powered up!
Mandolin Bash
Bard uses their mandolin like a hammer. Hope it doesn't break...
Bard brings their mandolin down like a mallet! Careful, looks like it's falling apart...
{surprised} Bard SMASHES the mandolin into pieces! {sad} I TOLD you it was going to break!
Discord
{confused} Bard plays a really really painful chord...~is that even music?
The Monster is still reeling from the discordant chord...~Yikes!!
A Heckin' Good Song
What a good song!! The Monsters are dancing along, maybe they will be distracted by it and not attack!!
Wow, the song has really improved! The Monsters are dancing along, they look very distracted. Will they remember to attack?
The monsters have that Heckin' Good Song stuck in their heads still!
Looks like the monster forgot to attack! It was grooving to Bard's song!
Bard plays a really really painful chord... {sad} The monsters stop dancing along to that Heckin' Good Song.~You ruined it.
4 Chord Strum
{cheer} Bard plays a steady, catchy song, making all of their music SLAP way harder!
Focus Ki
Monk focuses their ki! {determined} Their fists burn with unlocked power!!
Panchi
{cheer} Monk unleashes a disciplined punch!
Chikara o Bichikusuru Panchi
Monk charges up their fighting spirit...
{determined} Monk unleashes all of their charged up fighting spirit in the form of a FIST!!
Armadillo Stance
Monk changes to the Armadillo Stance, trading their attack power with a more defensive form!
Dive Bomb
Harpy dive bombs into the heroes head first!
The recoil from the dive bomb hurt Harpy!
Swoop
Harpy swoops into the into the hero to grabs them!
The pick up has left Harpy too tired to move.
Harpy is too tired to move this turn.
Wing Attack
Harpy leaps towards the hero and hits them with her wings.
Wing Gust
Harpy uses her wings to create strong gust of wind. All the heros are hurt!
Angelic Heal
Harpy uses magic to heal themselves!
A Slap'a Goo
{confused} Blobbo swings a...~"fist" of goo?
Spittin' Goo
Blobbo spits a big wad of goo that hits everyone!
Crustify
Blobbo's been out in the sun too long, he got a little crusty. He might take hits a little better.
Goo Trap
Blobbo tries to trap its enemies in a binding goo!
The goo is very binding! {surprised} Our heroes can't attack for a little bit!
{confused} The goo was too runny!~It rolls right off.~Um, gross!
You can't attack!~The goo is still too sticky!
{cheer} The goo has lost its stickyness!~You can move again!
The heroes are already trapped in goo!
Bite
Drago takes a dang BITE.~YOUCH (yum)!
Tail Smack
Drago smacks y'all with its tail.
Stab
{shock} Fishguy JAMS THEIR TRIDENT FORWARD WOAH!
Throw
{surprised} Fishguy uses their fish strength to hurl a hero!!
Splash
{cheer} Fishguy uses splash! {sad} It has no effect.~Not even an animation.
Poke with Banan
Fishguy pokes you with Banan. {confused} Yeah, that tracks.
You become utterly confused at how this is a thing.
Banan Bazooka
{surpirsed} Looks like Fishguy is...~charging up some kind of attack?~Uh oh.
{shock} WOAH!~Banan rocket!!~That did a lot of damage!!
For some unknown reason, Banan failed to fire from the Bazooka!
Friendship Never Dies
{cheer} The power of friendship is the strongest of all!! {talk} You're gobsmacked by their undying comraderie!!
Heavenly Slash
Paladin slashes with the power of the heavens!!
Paladin slashes with the power of the heave-... {surprised} Looks like Paladin got their sword stuck in Blobbo!~Can you get it back?
Tremendous Slash
Paladin unleashes a slash tremendous enough to attack all monsters!!
{cheer} Paladin unleashes a slash tremendous enough to attack multiple monsters!! {sad} But there's only one, so that's kind of a bummer.
Bright Sparkles
Paladin envelopes themself in Bright Sparkles, honing their aim on the enemy!
Holy Sparkles
{cheer} Paladin summons the power of the heavens to sooth every hero's achin' bones!
Paladin summons the power of the heavens to sooth their own wounds!
Paladin summons the power of the heavens to sooth every hero's achin' bones! {sad} Oh, looks like it was a little too late for your friend...
Heavenly Punch
Paladin punches with the power of the heavens! Not exactly the same as a slash...
Tremendous Punch
Paladin unleashes a TREMENDOUS punch! Hitting all monsters but, like, not for a lot of damage.
Paladin is enveloped in Bright Sparkles, honing their aim! Guess you need all you can get without a sword...
Sword in the Goo
Paladin attempts to retreive their sword from the Blobbo!!
{cheer} YES!~Paladin retreived their sword, dealing a HEAVY blow to Blobbo!
{sad} Oo..~it was too slippery..~try again maybe.
Headbutt
{confused} Banan smashes its soft...~uh...~head?~against you!!
Shoot Banan
{cheer} Banan shoots its soft banana body STRAIGHT at the hero at HIGH SPEEDS. Too bad Banan is bruised now!
Appealing!
Banan slicks up the ground with its slippery ways! {surprised} Watch out!~You might trip and fall!
Whoops!~The ground is too slippery, you fell and bumped your head!
Burning Touch
Banan spits out some FLAMBÉ!
Flamethrower
{determined} Banan gives you a kiss…~OF FIRE! That could leave you a BURNING present!!
Flame Breath
{surprised} Banan lets out a HUGE wave of fire!!~It can burn you!! I don't know if it can do THAT again!!
Caramelize
Banan caramelizes all of you, yum!
Useless Staff Whack
White Mage bonks the monster with their big stick.~Youch.
Desperate Staff Whack
White Mage DESPERATELY flails their big stick.
{surprised} Wow looks like White Mage doesn't know their own strength...
Heal 3
White Mage bathes their team with a bright, healing glow.
White Mage bathes themself in a bright, healing glow.
White Mage bathes themself in a bright healing glow. {sad} A little late for their friend, though...
Life 2
{determined} White Mage thwarts death, returning their ally to their mortal coil.
Boy, that would a waste.~No one is dead, silly.
Medicinal Sparkles
White Mage summons sparkles, healing their team of any status ailments.
Throw a Rock (with hand)
Geomancer hucks a rock like anyone can. {confused} Seems kinda like a waste.
Raise Earth
Geomancer surrounds themself with more rocks and debris.
Geomancer tries to pull up more rocks from the ground, but there are no more left!
Rock Wall
Geomancer raises a rock wall from the ground, protecting the heroes from physical attacks.
Geomancer raises a rock wall from the ground, protecting them from physical attacks.
Throw a Rock (with magic)
Geomancer throw rocks through the air using magic!!
{cheer} Geomancer hucks a rock with MAGIC! See?~Much better.
{shock} WOAH!~This is very rare!! A Shifty Fishguy! This slippery creature is incredibly hard to hit.~If you can beat him I'll be VERY impressed.
Yowzers! Shifty Fishguy poked you! Ouch!~That's gotta hurt!~Youch!~Oo!
Throw Spear
Watch it!~Shifty Fishguy knows how to huck that weapon!
{surprised} DANG!~That was dead on! Are you okay??
Splish
{cheer} Splish splash Fishguy's flingin' water everywhere! They seem to be getting more slippery...
{surprised} Woah!~This attack is a little stronger now! Must be all the slipperiness!
Puddle
Fishguy makes a puddle of slippery water underneath our heroes!~Uh oh!~Better watch out!!
Arrow Zip
An arrow zips through the air!
Rain from Above
Arrows rain from above! {shock} That many arrows could hit a lot of monsters!!
Magic Ghost Sword
{determined} A magic sword emerges from the woods, mirroring any attacks Ranger unleashes.
Arrows en Fuego
Ranger lights their arrows on fire. Hope no one gets burned!
Oh, they got burned!
Forest Love
Ranger communicates with the forest, enveloping their team in its healing energy.
Ranger communicates with the forest and becomes enveloped in its healing energy.
Desperate Headbutt
Mushboy headbutts you. {sad} Hey, they're trying.~Don't laugh.
{shock} WOAH!~GEEZ!~WHAT~THE HEY?~THAT HURT!
Desperate Kick
Mushboy tries to...~kick you?~Okay...
{surprised} Woah, Mushboy's kick left you a little rattled! I dunno if you can take as many hits now...
Trying to Spore
Mushboy tries to spore, but has no hat! {determined} They get so angry, they could scream!! {confused} Is the anger making Mushboy stronger??
Mushboy tries again to spore. {determined} Don't know why, but now they're SUPER mad!
Mushboy once again tries to spore. {shock} IT WORKS! Just kidding.~It does nothing.~Mushboy is SUPER pissed!!
Pounce OWO
Hunter notices your vulnerability OWO what's this??
Stab Stab
Hunter does a quick little stabby stab, OUCH!
Stalk
Hunter studies its prey...
Hunter understands how their prey works, Hunter will now take resources from each monster they attack!!
Hop Around
Hunter starts hoppin' around all willy nilly, must be hard to hit now!
Surrounded by Slices
Banan's little slices surround you, glaring at your judgingly.
Banan slices hated that!~They smack you a lil!
Slice Barrage
{cheer} Banan attacks you with a barrage of slices! Ouch, ooo, woah, yikes!~Are you okay?~That was a lot of little pieces!
SPARKLES
{shock} SPARKLY!!!~SO SHINY!!~WOW! {cheer} I think Blobbo is feeling a lot stronger now!
Yuck!~You got slapped with goo! {confused} Or maybe you're into that. I don't know I don't judge.
You got slapped a bunch!!~Gross!
Scream
Bard screams at the top of their lungs.
Sing out of Key
Bard sings the worst note they can possibly muster.~AUGH!!
The monster is still kind of confused about that note from last turn...~Were they TRYING to sing or...?
An Okay Song
I mean, it's an okay song.~The monsters are kinda groovin'.
The monsters remember that okay song...~MAYBE they'll be distracted by it?
Wow, lucky you.~Guess that okay song was okay enough to get the monster groovin.
Beatboxin'
The perfect beat to catch a monster offguard with a good scream...
{cheer} Mushboy slams its cute little mushroom top at you! I think you heard a squeek!
Bounce
Mushboy bounces high up in the air!~Kind of cute!
Muchboy SLAMS its soft adorable body onto your FACE.~Youch!
Poison Spores
Mushboy releases some poison spores!! {sad} I feel sick already!
Sleepy Spores
Mushboy unleashes some Sleepy Spores! {shock} A hero has fallen asleep!! You can't fight if you're asleep!!
The hero is still asleep from the Sleepy Spores!
The hero woke up from the Sleepy Spores!
Smelly Spores
Mushboy sprays out some Smelly Spores!~Um, gross? {confused} I think your team might be a little upset by this.
Sloppy Slap
Mushboy uses its deflated lil hat thing to try to slap you.~Ouch?
Struggle
{determined} Mushboy is trying, it really is.
{shocked} WOAH!~I guess Mushboy pulled something out there!!
Candle
Candle just...~Candles.
Get Brighter
{determined} With the power of a thousand suns-... Candle's flame got slightly brighter!
Fall Over
Candle lost its balance and fell over, I guess.
Swipe
Koboldio takes a little swipe with its claws.
Koboldio starts chomping!!
Disappear
{shock} Kobold goes invisible! Might be a little hard to hit.
Reappear
{cheer} Kobold reappears as a STRONGER creature, watch out!!
Kobold reappears in human form! Oh!~A Paladin!~Very stylish.
Kobold reappears in human form! {confused} What the...~A Monk?!
Kobold reappears as a candle! Seems random but, yeah, Kobolds do that sometimes.
Mandolin Whack
Koboldio whacks you with the mandolin! Hey!~Don't break that!!
Mandolin Play
Koboldio plays a little tune. Or tries to?~Anyway, you've got a bit of a headache now...
Is This Food
{shock} WOAH!~Koboldio took a bite out of that mandolin! I don't think Bard is too happy about that.
Bard tried to attack but the pain of having their mandolin bit into got them a little tripped up...
Sword Spin
{cheer} Blobbo does a SPIN ATTACK!~Holy crap! {determined} You better get that sword back!
Oh.~It looks like you did.~Nice.
Confusion
Blobbo raises its defense for a second while it tries to parse out what's going on with the sword...
Blobbo spits at you multiple times!!! Yuck!~At least it didn't use your sword...
Mushboy is still in the air, and can't be attacked! {sad} Your turn has been wasted!
%s shakes with fear at the Hunter.~Oh no!
%s shakes with fear at the Hunter.~Oh gosh!
%s shakes with fear at the Hunter.~Oh gooosh!
The monster is scared to attack right now.
Banan falls in love with White Mage's Banan-like magic staff.
{determined} Banan doesn't care, if this is what love is, so be it! (it doesn't really hurt that much).
Harpy dances gracefully to the music!
Fishguy busts a move to that sick beat!
Banan gets down to that funky jam!
Monk lost his energy somehow.
Mushboy lost his focus and fell back down!
{shock} Blobbo absorbs the blow! {determined} Blobbo is FILLED WITH FIGHTING VIGOR!
{shock} Ranger shoots Mushboy's hat right off! {sad} Mushboy is embarassed!!
Koboldio thinks Paladin is a Lion Friend and won't attack a fellow monster!
Koboldio is heartbroken that a friend would betray them!! {cheer} Their sad anger increases their attack!
Watch out!~Banan bruises easily!!
Banan gets sliced!~Banan becomes a poppable snack!
Mushboy becomes mesermized by Geomancer's floating stones!
Mushboy feels silly having been distracted by such a simple ruse!
Mushboy is too mesmerized by the Geomancer's floating stones to do anything.
Harpy loves all the sparkles!!
Harpy trusted the sparkles!~Harpy cries! They use their magic to SEAL all sparkle techniques!
Shiny Blobbo cheers for sparkles!~Sparkly Blobbo gives the hero a healing kiss!!
Fishguy loves Paladin's beautiful hair! Fishguy combs it with their pitchfork.~Wow!~It sparkles!!
The monster thinks this matchup is unfair!~What a perfect duo! {determined} Their attack and defense increases again!
Wow!~All of these Arpeegees are "uncommon!" What are the odds!~Now they have top hats on.
Woah!~All of these Arpeegees are "rare"!! That's, well, rare!~Now they all SPARKLE!
Hunter got all Gooed up! Now Hunter is covered in goo!~They can't be swift now!
Hunter got cleaned up by Fishguy's watery attack!~Thanks Fishguy!
Paladin's sword got stuck in Blobbo! {surprised} Now Blobbo is confused and has a sword, and Paladin is confused and doesn't!!
The fire makes Banan become a delicious dessert! Banan Foster goes great with vanilla ice cream!
What a punch!~Mushboy pops! His poison hat deflates, releasing all the poisonous spores!
Monk keeps busting up Geomancer's rocks as training!
Koboldio steals Bard's Mandolin and loves it! {confused} Though I don't think he knows how to play...
{cheer} Fishguy thinks this configuration is better!~Teamwork!
{determined} Fishguy is humbled by this display of kindness and gives the victory to you!
All Allies
Back
